item.title: Requiescant
item.description: Requiescant, also known as Kill and Pray, is a 1967 Spaghetti Western film directed by Carlo Lizzani.

item.title: Seven Dollars on the Red
item.description: Sette dollari sul rosso is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone. It stars Anthony Steffen as the main character.

item.title: L'uomo che viene da Canyon City
item.description: Man from Canyon City is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar.

item.title: Tres dólares de plomo
item.description: Tres dólares de plomo is a 1964 Spaghetti Western film directed by Pino Mercanti.

item.title: Kill or Be Killed
item.description: Kill or Be Killed is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Tanio Boccia.

item.title: Grand Canyon Massacre
item.description: Grand Canyon Massacre is a 1964 Italian Spaghetti Western film starring James Mitchum, Milla Sannoner, and George Ardisson. It was directed by Sergio Corbucci and produced by Albert Band. The film's theme song was performed by Rod Dana.
